extracted_playbook.condition: Which product and version is in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Update MicroSCADA X SYS600
extracted_playbook.description: Update Hitachi Energy MicroSCADA X SYS600 to Version 10.6 to mitigate CVE-2024-4872 and CVE-2024-3980.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Patch to MicroSCADA Pro SYS600
extracted_playbook.description: Apply Patch 9.4 FP2 HF6 to Hitachi Energy MicroSCADA Pro SYS600. Ensure installation of previous FP2 hotfixes before HF6 to mitigate CVE-2024-4872 and CVE-2024-3980.

extracted_playbook.title: Physically Protect Process Control Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure process control systems are physically protected from unauthorized access and have no direct Internet connections.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Firewall Protections
extracted_playbook.description: Separate process control systems from other networks using a firewall system with minimal exposed ports.

extracted_playbook.title: Restrict Internet Usage on Control Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure process control systems are not used for Internet surfing, instant messaging, or receiving emails.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Portable Devices for Viruses
extracted_playbook.description: Carefully scan portable computers and removable storage media for viruses before connecting them to control systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Enforce Proper Password Policies
extracted_playbook.description: Follow proper password policies and processes to secure systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Deploy According to Cybersecurity Guidelines
extracted_playbook.description: Deploy products following the 'MicroSCADA cybersecurity deployment guideline' document.

extracted_playbook.title: Maintain Systems with Supported Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure systems are maintained with products running on supported versions and follow maintenance releases.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement CISA Recommended Cybersecurity Strategies
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, including defense-in-depth strategies.
